comment: NADPH---hemoprotein reductase is this enzyme itself. The reduced enzyme serves as electron-donor for heme-containing enzymes (ex. cytochrome P-450;ec 1.14.14.1)
definition: [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + NADPH + H+ <=> [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + NADP+
name: cytochrome P-450 reductase
